(static) deleteNotifData(key)

Delete notification data based on key. If key is not provided, entire notification data is deleted.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
key string Key for the notification data to be deleted.

(static) microappDone(paramsopt)

Called by callee microapp when it is done. This is used to pass back any data to calling microapp.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
params object <optional>
 Params that need to be passed to calling microapp.
Source:
  • apis/hikeUtils.js, line 64

(static) openMicroapp(mAppId, params) → {Promise}

Open a Microapp with an option to get it from server on device if not present already. This is exposed as a private method since other UIDs of microapps are unknown as of now and this would be replaced by individual Microapp invocation methods once they are.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
mAppId string Microapp Id for the Microapp to be opened.
params object Parameters which control microapp opening behavior and data to be passed along to the other microapp.
Properties
Name Type Description
getIfMissing Boolean True if the app has to be downloaded if it is missing on user's device.
passData object JSON object that is passed to the microapp being opened. Received as passData in main component props when the Microapp being opened spawns.
Source:
  • apis/hikeUtils.js, line 56
Returns:
Resolved if Microapp is being successfully opened. Rejected if there is some error when opening a Microapp. For eg. if a Microapp doesn't exist on a user's device or some other error occurs. You can hook into this promise's response to show a loader for eg. or an error toast in case it fails.
Type
Promise
